thread.title: BRIEF-ZK International And Its Subsidiary, XSigma Sign Worldwide Distribution Agreement With TNT Blockchain

title: BRIEF-ZK International And Its Subsidiary, XSigma Sign Worldwide Distribution Agreement With TNT Blockchain

organizations.name: reuters) - zk international group co ltd

text:
31 PM / Updated 6 minutes ago BRIEF-ZK International And Its Subsidiary, XSigma Sign Worldwide Distribution Agreement With TNT Blockchain Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
Feb 12 (Reuters) - ZK International Group Co Ltd: 
* ZK INTERNATIONAL AND ITS SUBSIDIARY, XSIGMA CORPORATION, SIGN EXCLUSIVE WORLDWIDE DISTRIBUTION AGREEMENT WITH TNT BLOCKCHAIN, INC. 
* ZK INTERNATIONAL GROUP CO LTD - DEAL ‍TO IMPLEMENT SOFTWARE & BLOCKCHAIN TECHNOLOGIES INTO ITS MANUFACTURING PROCESS AND SUPPLY CHAIN MANAGEMENT SYSTEM​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
